players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia."
Charlie: "I am the detective and found Diana to be the mafioso"
You: "I am not the mafia. Can someone check my alibi?"
Charlie: "I am the detective and have identified Diana as the mafioso. Bob, I will verify your alibi to ensure you are telling the truth."
Diana: "Bob is lying, he's the mafioso."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia."
You: "I am the detective and found Diana to be the mafioso"
Bob: "I am not the mafia. Can someone check my alibi?"
You: "I am the detective and have identified Diana as the mafioso. Bob, I will verify your alibi to ensure you are telling the truth."
Diana: "Bob is lying, he's the mafioso."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
